full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAMS RING GI RTZA RGYUR GYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, @015A *, ,DE NAS CHUD RGYAS NAS BGYIS PA ZHES AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, ,SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YI PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAM RGYAL THA SHAL BA, ,BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BA'I BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYENG NGAN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZOD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
